thread.title: Jason Statham and Gal Gadot battle thugs in Super Bowl ad
thread.title_full: Jason Statham and Gal Gadot battle thugs in Super Bowl ad | Daily Mail Online

author: Stephanie Haney At Dailymail.com
title: Jason Statham and Gal Gadot battle thugs in Super Bowl ad
text:
It started as a quiet dinner in a nice restaurant, where two people lock eyes across the room.
But since the pair were Jason Statham and Gal Gadot, it wasn't long before all hell broke loose.
The Hollywood stars were the leads in a Super Bowl commercial for a website development company which aired during the big game on Sunday.
Scroll down for video
Smashing performance! Jason Statham and Gal Gadot brought the action in a Super Bowl commercial for a website development company Wix.com
Statham, 49, and Gadot, 31, became the modern day Mr. and Mrs. Smith in the ad for Wix.com.
While they started out eating meals at separate tables, a young chef is taking his break in the kitchen.
He puts on headphones, opens up a laptop and and set about creating a website for the very establishment they were in.
Strangers: Statham and gadot are first seen eating meals at separate tables before catching each other's eyes from across the room
Oblivious: meanwhile, a young chef is taking his break in the restaurant kitchen and working on a laptop
Project: He set about creating a website for the very establishment he was in
Has a plan: Gadot, 31, looked gorgeous in a plunging black dress and flawless make-up
Suddenly into the restaurant come a group of well-dressed but dangerous men who surrounded Gadot at her table.
Statham stood up as Gadot slid off her high heel making it the perfect weapon and the action ensued.
In a few well-choreographed moves, Statham managed to grab a bottle of wine from a serving tray and chivalrously pour wine for his date, who had yet to be destroyed by the brawl.
Fighting stance: Suddently in walked a group of well-dressed men who proceeded to surround Gadot at her table
Getting ready: Statham got up as Gadot slid off her high heel which made the perfect weapon
Here we go! The two proceeded to literally destroy the assailants... and the restaurant
Getting down: Gadot slid across the floor as she kicked one man, breaking a chair
Chivalry is not dead! Statham managed to grab a bottle of wine from a serving tray and chivalrously pour wine for his date
Finally the two martial artists find themselves back to back with a blowtorch.
The camera cuts to outside as we see the Chez Felix Bistro go up in flames.
Back inside, the gorgeous Gadot miraculously finds an untainted piece of dessert, as the chef comes out from the kitchen in shock to find the restaurant in shambles.
Back to back: Finally the two martial artists find themselves back to back with a blowtorch
Fiery fight: The camera cuts to outside as we see the Chez Felix Bistro go up in flames
In shock: Back inside, the chef- comes out from the kitchen in shock to find the restaurant in shambles
Dessert please! The gorgeous Gadot miraculously found an untainted piece of desert and asked: 'Can I have this to go?'
'Can I have this to go?' she asked, to which the young man responded with a smirk.
A voice from nowhere then brings it all full circle, saying, 'To succeed in a disruptive world, Wix makes it easy to create your own stunning website.'
And just like that, Chez Felix, Gourmet To Go was born, and the short story closes on a light blue food truck with a line across the lot, serving up delicacies by the oblivious website creator.
Genius! A lightbulb went off and the young chef responded with a smirk
Happy ending: The short story closed on a light blue food truck with a line across the lot, serving up delicacies by the oblivious website creator
